name: Torso of Legion
effect:
:instant: Reduce the cost of Recruitment or reduce the cost of Reinforcing a [unit](../units/index.md) by 6 :gold: (to a minimum of 0).

— OR —

:instant: Gain 1 :valuables: or 2 :building_materials:.
flavor_text: Searching a ruin, you are amazed to find a piece of the Statue of Legion. You carefully dust it off before placing it in your pack.
